message.name: ERR_FV_ADDITIONAL_SEARCH_CRITERIA_NEEDED
message.locale: Additional search criteria must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_TO_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If a period from date is entered, a period to date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_FV_FROM_DATE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: If a period to date is entered, a period from date must be entered.
